name: Bjorn the Viking (Prototype)
description:
Ever wanted to be a Viking, but also an Ice Skater? Well this is the game for you!

Bjorn the Viking is a young viking with a big heart and a bigger dream, to become Scandinavia's best Ice Skater!

This is just a prototype, don't expect too much haha

Movement:

A/D - Horizontal movement

Space - Jump

Shift - Slide

1/2/3/4/5 - Summon enemies (debug tool)

R - Restart level

Have fun  :D
